room_title: Escape room "Pyramid Heist" by PanIQ Escape Room in New York
review: I've done a couple escape rooms before in NYC (and I work at one!) and this is the best I've been to yet. Beautiful design with challenging, unique puzzles and a sweet touchscreen communication interface. Also, the guy running the games while we were there, David, was awesome-- friendly and very helpful!

room_title: Escape room "Pyramid Heist" by PanIQ Escape Room in New York
review: I love this place. I took my boyfriend here and we had such a great time. It's better with more people so everyone is thinking but overall it was supper fun and we will definitely go back. Prices are pretty decent too!!

room_title: Escape room "Pyramid Heist" by PanIQ Escape Room in New York
review: I've been to couple escape rooms in the past that weren't that great, but I really enjoyed this one!  I wasn't interested in trying anymore, but I'm glad I have it another shot.  It was TOUGH and actually challenging.  There were a group of us and we working together the whole time.  We figured out so many puzzles and clues and it was a fantastic time.  This renewed my interest in escape rooms and I am willing to go again!
